mapper.delete:
delete from sys_user_post where id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.pid, a.uid, a.sort, a.org_code, a.org_name, a.org_type, a.wfmark, a.remark, a.tenant_id, a.wind_farm, a.enable, a.level, a.create_time from sys_organization a where a.org_type=1 and a.enable=0 and a.tenant_id=#{bean.tenantId} order by sort asc

select a.id as windFarm, a.org_name as windFarmName from sys_organization a ,sys_user_organization b where a.id=b.organization_id and a.tenant_id=b.tenant_id and a.org_type=1 and a.enable=0 and b.tenant_id=#{bean.tenantId} and b.user_id=#{bean.userId} order by sort asc

select a.id, a.org_name as orgName, (select count(*) from sys_user_organization where organization_id=a.id) as count from sys_organization a where a.tenant_id=#{bean.tenantId} and a.uid=#{bean.id} order by a.id asc
select b.id, b.user_name from sys_user_organization a, sys_user_info b where a.user_id=b.id and a.tenant_id=#{bean.tenantId} and a.organization_id=#{bean.id}
